amendment.description: Amendment prohibits use of funds in the Harbor Maintenance Trust Fund for activities beyond dredging and maintenance of harbors.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 20 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit use of funds to develop or submit a proposal to expand the authorized uses of the Harbor Maintenance Trust Fund described in section 9505(c) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kelly (PA) amendment (A068) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Kelly (PA) amendment (A068) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A068) offered by Mr. Kelly (PA).
